ComicInfo.Summary:
The deadly Dart, head of the notorious Vicious Circle, wants young recruits—so she’s raiding the nursery and going after the most powerful recruits possible: Dragon babies!
Note: Includes the back-up comics:
Aquaria in Smile & Wave, by Adam McGovern, Paolo Leandri, Dominic Regan, and Steve Pricel. 6 pages. Brainpan & Cheesy, by Gary Fields Draw Brandon Draw, by Brandon B.
ComicInfo.Writer: Adam McGovern,Erik Larsen,Brandon B.,Gary Fields,Brandon B.,Gary Fields,Adam McGovern,Erik Larsen
ComicInfo.Title: Smile & Wave
